recommendations.Flu: Rest, drink plenty of fluids, take over-the-counter pain relievers. Consult a doctor if symptoms worsen.
recommendations.Common Cold: Get adequate rest, stay hydrated, use saline nasal drops. Usually resolves within 7-10 days.
recommendations.Pneumonia: Seek immediate medical attention. May require antibiotics and hospitalization.
recommendations.COVID-19: Isolate yourself, monitor oxygen levels, consult a doctor. Seek emergency care if breathing difficulty increases.
recommendations.Migraine: Rest in a dark room, apply cold compress, take prescribed medications. Identify and avoid triggers.
recommendations.Diabetes: Consult an endocrinologist for proper management. Monitor blood sugar regularly and maintain a healthy diet.
recommendations.Hypertension: Regular monitoring, lifestyle changes, medication as prescribed. Reduce salt intake and exercise regularly.
recommendations.Asthma: Use prescribed inhalers, avoid triggers, have an action plan ready. Seek emergency care for severe attacks.
recommendations.default: Consult a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment. Do not self-medicate.
